title: Facets control charge separation during photoelectrochemical water oxidation with strontium titanate (SrTiO3) single crystals
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3493-3502
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04308H, Paper
Samutr Assavachin, Chengcan Xiao, Kathleen Becker, Frank E. Osterloh
The photoelectrochemical water oxidation activity of SrTiO3 crystals is determined by the variable work functions of different facets. This produces facet dependent semiconductor–liquid junctions that can drive charge separation in photocatalysts.
